author: Boston Dynamics
description:
What if you could detect, diagnose, and act—before issues even arise? With Spot and Orbit, you can.

Orbit provides a real-time digital record of your facility—capturing everything from hot motors and hidden air leaks to compliance and regulatory risks. That means your team can see what’s happening, understand why, and predict when it might happen again.

From preventive maintenance to overall site health, this is the smarter way to run your operations.

Learn more: https://bostondynamics.com/products/orbit/
See all the latest updates: https://bostondynamics.com/blog/see-your-facility/
title: Check it off the list, with Spot & Orbit | Boston Dynamics
